Author: Femtobeam
Title: Fixed: Video Jumping to beginning or scrolling to end
Review:
Update: Five Stars! The issue was fixed and it works great! The Play App is a wonderful way to watch my library and the developer response was quick. In any case, if there ever is a problem in the future, your Google library can also be found on YouTube. Thanks.

Older: This issue has destroyed the use of Google Play movies on IOS and iPad Pro. For at least that long the app has ruined the ability to watch any film in my library in the app. It is true of purchased or rented videos. Suddenly, the audio will continue but the video has jumped to somewhere near the beiginning of the movie. After trying to scroll back a few times to the spot where it happened the scroll bar will go all the way to the end and there is no way to move the scroll bar. I see a large number of complaints about this here in the reviews. This needs a fix ASAP.

Author: Eddie Eddie 1234
Title: Garbage app
Review: It’s Father’s Day. All I wanted to do was eat a steak, have a glass of scotch, and watch Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. Steak. Check. Scotch. Check. Now I have a one year old which means seeing a movie in the theater is not an option. Upon looking this movie up, I found it to be available only on this app. Alright, I’ll give it a shot and pay the required $15 for the movie. First hour was fine. Streaming clearly. Then, glitch after glitch after glitch. I discovered, if I stopped the movie then restarted, it would fix itself. But towards the end of the movie, I had to stop and restart about every 5 minutes. This app is absolute garbage. I’ll be deleting this from my device immediately and never using again. Good thing my steak and scotch were good otherwise this app may have ruined Father’s Day.

Author: ColumbiaShopper
Title: What Kind of a Joke is This?
Review:
This app is terrible! 
How in the world did Google put this out? 
I expected a lot more from them. 
Purchased a movie ($25 for 48 hour access) and was never able to make it through the entire film as the picture would begin jumping to random parts of the movie though the audio continued as if nothing happened to the picture. 
We tried everything (close app and reopen, uninstall and reinstall app, go through the website instead of the app, fast forward, rewind, iPad, iPhone) but nothing worked. 
I finally started a chat with Customer Service (Kristy P) after over a dozen unsuccessful attempts to view this movie within less than a day and was promised a refund after chatting back and forth for over an hour and twenty minutes (the delay is especially ridiculous considering I was put on hold for the majority of the time because the system kept “kicking back the request” and I was repeatedly told “I will check back within five minutes” many times). After waiting for over an hour, I was then told to complete more “steps” after initially being told a refund would not be an issue and could be completed promptly.
NEVER AGAIN!!
I’ll stick with Netflix and Hulu for now and I won’t hold my breath for that refund ($25 lesson learned).
Developer Reply: Thank you for taking the time to reach out. Could you please let us know if you're still encountering this issue? We've pushed an update, which should address this. If you are still encountering this problem, please get in touch with our specialists here: https://g.co/help/vxlws

Author: Nelcent
Review:
I don’t normally write these but this issue has happened a couple of times, across multiple devices, and with multiple movies so it’s become a bit of a pattern.

 It seems to work well for the first hour or so of a movie but more and more recently, around an hour and 15 or so I get a playback error. I closed the whole app and quit it, thinking that would help but it just started me at the beginning of the movie with no ability to skip to where I had been previously. If I try to skip ahead, it just buffers endlessly. If it does finally start playing, it will start playing the sound of where I wanted it to start but the pictures of a few minutes into the movie.

So you get to try again several times on iPhone and iPad to get the video to play, give up, try the lighting-HDMI adaptor to bypass air play issues but can’t do that either due to the video being protected. I’m so glad I paid for content I can’t watch due to the issues this app has.

Author: Kristi1964
Title: Movie issue
Review:
I purchased the set of 3 John Wick movies.  Towards the end of the second movie one of the following would occur:  the sound would stop playing with picture only.  The sound would continue but the picture would suddenly flip back to part of the beginning of the movie while
Still playing sound from where I just was. I would log off and reset my phone and go back in and it would pick up where it left off but then would do it again a few minutes later.  I did 5 attempts before I finally got to see the end of the second movie.  Now I’m watching the 3rd movie and it’s been fine all the way through until now the last 15 mins of movie it is doing the same exact thing.  It’s very frustrating and at this point I’ve reset and still haven’t gotten to the end of the movie.  If this was a rental I would really be angry (because I would be wasting my watch time before it could expire) and demand a refund.  I hope I can see the end of this 3rd movie because I’ll want a partial refund if I can’t get it to work.  DEVELOPERS.... you’ve got some technical
Work to fix here! ASAP!!

Update: it seems many people have this same complaint. I’ve also tried watching additional movies since then and the same thing happens, at the end of the movie. So it’s basically ruining the end of each movie you purchase and watch. On you don’t care about this problem because I don’t see you addressing it with anyone, anywhere.  I thought this would be a great place to create a movie library.  I guess you won’t be getting any more of my money. You stink.

Author: rafalimareis
Title: Horrível!!! Perda de tempo!!!!
Review: Perdi 40 minutos tentando ver um filme, quando colocava no inglês e legendado em português ele sempre fechava sozinho e voltava pro dublado. Abri e fechei o aplicativo várias vezes e deu como expirado meu período de assistir ao filme, sendo que fiquei com ele alugado por 40 minutos e já expirou! Sacanagem google, façam um aplicativo que preste para seus clientes!!!! R$16,90 mais meu tempo jogados no lixo!

Title: Subtitels
Review: Er zijn bijna geen films met Nederlandse ondertiteling, waardeloos. Doe hier iets aan.

Author: Tilejoseph
Title: Screen fit needs to be fixed on IPhone X and up
Review: The screen is a small box on IPhone X and up. This is a big issue and needs to be fixed! For example “Spider-Man Far from home” does not fit the screen and is hard to see.
